<!-- getting datas -->
```{r, include=FALSE}
  data = read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/camilleguerry/stat-sur-le-site-de-Rennes/master/statistiques-de-frequentation-du-site-rennes-metropole-en-acces-libre.csv",sep=";")
  names(data) = c("Date","NumberOfVisitors","NumberOfViewedPages")
```
##Number of visitors
```{r data}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = data, aes(x=Date, y=NumberOfVisitors)) + geom_point()
```
